title: Taming The Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhwa   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Determined Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Bultandat   Firelady   불탄닷
description:
I woke up as the daughter of the grand duke in the novel of my favorite character, Raon. This is the move of the divine hand in a fangirl’s life!

But why do I have to be Estina, the villainess who bitterly tormented Raon his whole life?!

Raon is disgusted by the mere presence of Estina.

However, I did not give up and I persistently stalked Raon to be close with him. ”Excuse me, Raon!”

“No, thank you.”

“I didn’t even say anything yet……”

“I will literally say ‘No thanks’ to anything you say.”

He totally ignored me at first but,

At least he is technically talking to me now? I will keep my fangirl spirit alive. Best of luck, me!>
